review: This was a Christmas girt for my husband.  He absolutely loves it.  A great investment.
author: Yolanda Williams

review: The streaming stick works good.. sometimes I loose sound , I'm not sure  if it's Netflix or the stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Fast shiping, and have enjoyed this for a lot. Works great!
author: faeriewhisper

review: It didn't fit in the back of our tuner.
author: Cindy Kops

review: Works as well as my Roku XD ever did, maybe even a little faster.  Requires USB power, but not a big deal since most TV's have USB port right next to the HDMI ports.
author: Brad

review: Really slow compared to other Roku devices. It's painfully slow switching between navigation or even within apps like Netflix. Definitely should have bought the Roku 3.
author: Trevor Collins

review: had to get my wifi router adjusted which cost an extra $30 to get it to work
author: kelly chandler
